name: El Pájaro Quemamais
description:
This is our failed entry for Unidos GameJam, we failed the submission.

El Pájaro Quemamais is a bird that has been living in "Hacienda Santa Catarina" for  a long time , help him interfere and play around all this drama.

Use the mouse to interact with the house.

Quemamais can fly around different spots in the world marked with .

He's also capable of interacting with items.
